data: <name> name = [ Chicago Athletic Association ] ; <address> address = [ 12 S Michigan Ave, Chicago, IL 60603, USA ] ; <feelsHotel> feelsHotel = [ chic ] ; <hasBarOnsite> hasBarOnsite = [ yes ] ; <hasRestaurant> hasRestaurant = [ yes ] ; <hasMeetingRooms> hasMeetingRooms = [ yes ] ; <hasOnsiteCafe> hasOnsiteCafe = [ yes ] ; <hasBathroomMarbleInRooms> hasBathroomMarbleInRooms = [ yes ] ; <hasFloorToCeilingWindowsInRooms> hasFloorToCeilingWindowsInRooms = [ yes ] ; <hasMiniBarInRoom> hasMiniBarInRoom = [ yes ] ; <hasFireplace> hasFireplace = [ yes ]
response: An interesting choice is the Chicago Athletic Association. There is a restaurant, onsite bar, and onsite cafe for the food and drink lover. Meeting rooms are also available for those who wish to use them. These rooms feature floor to ceiling windows with sweeping views and an in-suite fire place. All rooms come equipped with a mini bar and spa bathroom featuring marble floors.

response: A chic hotel Chicago Athletic Association has an onsite cafe, restaurant and a bar. It also boasts several meeting rooms. Each room has floor to ceiling windows, as well as marble in the bathrooms. The rooms also come with fireplaces and mini-bars for spending a relaxing evening in.
